edu.thu.keg.mdap.provider

Class DataProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.thu.keg.mdap.provider.DataProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HiveProvider

    public abstract class DataProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a data provider storing datasets. Can be a SQL database, Hive, HDFS files, etc.. It is recommended that subclasses are designed as singletons
    Author:
    Yuanchao Ma

    • Method Detail

      • executeQuery

        public abstract java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.lang.String query)
        Run a query against the dataset and return ResultSet
        Parameters:
        query - the query string returning a table
        Returns:
        the disconnected ResultSet returned by the query.

      • queryDataSet

        public java.sql.ResultSet queryDataSet(DataSet ds)
        Query the data provider the get the ResultSet of a dataset. Default implementation is calling executeQuery on the query statement of the dataset.
        Parameters:
        ds - the dataset whose contents (ResultSet) are expected
        Returns:
        the disconnected ResultSet of the dataset
